about_the_game:
Spark of Joy is a romantic comedy visual novel. Jack and Joy's love story begins like any other-filled with excitement, passion, and the promise of something deeper. As they embark on their journey together, life seems perfect. But fate intervenes when a devastating event forces Joy to put their relationship on hold, leaving Jack heartbroken and adrift.

You play as Jack.

In your quest to reclaim the connection you once shared with Joy, you cross paths with four alluring and complex women, each offering you a different kind of solace, distraction, or temptation. With your heart torn and your mind clouded by desire, you must navigate these entanglements, all while your longing for Joy remains the pulse beneath the surface.

Will you find your way back to the love you lost, or will the allure of these new relationships pull you in a direction you never expected?

It's up to you.

Explore and nurture Jack on his adventure seeking his Spark of Joy.

What's in the game:

  • HD images telling the stories of Jack, Joy, and four other hotties.

  • A story of romance, courtship, chance encounters, and carnal delights.

  • Animated sex scenes and other animations throughout to enrich the experience.

  • Immersive sound effects and music tracks that enhance atmosphere.

  • Point & click interactions with the environment.

content_descriptors.notes: Spark of Joy contains graphic sexual animated content for adults only.

short_description: Spark of Joy is a romantic comedy visual novel. The two central characters, Jack and Joy, experience a romance with all the ups and downs of life in this heartwarming, slice of life story. Make meaningful decisions at critical moments to shape Jack's love life for better - or worse.
